pages.text: $(l)(Passive-GameStart)/$$(br)Energy Start will give you extra energy when you start a game of Naval Warfare. Each Energy Start has one stat: Amount. It determines how much extra energy you get. Note that your energy can't exceed the maximum.

$(l)Tips & Tricks:/$$(li)Note that this ability only triggers once on game start. This means that you'll have extra energy to use in the first round to give you a head start in the game, but it won't do anything for the rest of the game.
